name: template_sf
title: Fixed value column Snowflake
description: This component adds a fixed value column to a table in Snowflake

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table to add the column to

inputs.name: value
inputs.title: Column value
inputs.description: The value to add to the column

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the column added
